title: Password Policy Description Schema
description: This shema describes the Password Policy Description JSON standard.

ppds.title: The collection of PPDs
ppds.description: A PPD may contain multiple PPD-items.

items.title: Password Policy Description
items.description: The Password Policy Description (PPD) represents a single password policy description for the given url.

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.description: Mutually exclusive with service item. If the PPD is a redirect PPD, this value points to the main URL. Otherwise, it is null or undefined.

items.title: CharacterSet
items.description: Represents the properties of the password.

name.title: CharacterSet name
name.description: The name of the character set.

characters.title: CharacterSet characters
characters.description: String containing all characters that will be added to the character set.

base.title: CharacterSet Base
base.description: Reference to an already defined character set. All characters from the character set referenced by this element will be added to the character set this element is a child of.

service.title: Service
service.description: Mutually exclusive with redirect item. Contains instructions to automate website logging in, password change, registration and password reset.

passwordReset.title: PasswordReset
passwordReset.description: This contains routines for resetting the password.

passwordChange.title: Password Change service
passwordChange.description: A set of routines for changing a password on a website.

url.title: URL
url.description: The human-friendly URL for changing the password.

items.title: Routine
items.description: A routine is a set of instructions that automate the change password process.

login.title: Login service
login.description: A set of routines for logging into a website.

url.title: URL
url.description: The human-friendly URL for logging in.

items.title: Routine
items.description: A routine is a set of instructions that automate the login process.

url.title: URL
url.description: The human-friendly URL for changing the password.

name.title: Name
name.description: Human-friendly name of the website the PPD is for.

version.title: Version
version.default: The current version of the PPD.

maxConsecutive.title: MaxConsecutive
maxConsecutive.description: Indicates whether consecutive characters are allowed or not. A omitted value or 0 indicates no limitation on consecutive characters.

expires.title: PasswordExpiry
expires.description: Password expiry in days. A value of 0 means no expiry.

maxLength.title: MaximumLength
maxLength.description: Maximum length of the password. A value of 0 means no maximum length.

characterSettings.title: CharacterSettings
characterSettings.description: Parent node for character settings. If the node is omitted, all characters defined in the characterSets element are treated as available for use with no restrictions on minimum and maximum ocurrences.

characterSetSettings.title: CharacterSetSettings
characterSetSettings.description: Settings element for a globally available character set

url.title: URL
url.description: Relative path of the webpage where this PPD will be used.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp when this PPD was created/updated. It should be in Unix Epoch time.

maxTries.title: MaxTries
maxTries.description: The amount of incorrect attempts before an accounts get locked. 0 means unlimited.

HTTPLoginRoutine.title: HTTPLoginRoutine
HTTPLoginRoutine.description: A login routine that can be executed by sending a HTTP-request.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

htmlLoginRoutine.title: HTMLLoginRoutine
htmlLoginRoutine.description: A login routine that does not rely on javascript.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An operation on the webpage that is part of the routine process. For example, load a page or fill and submit a form.

javascriptLoginRoutine.title: JavascriptLoginRoutine
javascriptLoginRoutine.description: A login routine that relies on javascript being enabled.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An operation on the webpage that is part of the routine process. For example, load a page or fill and submit a form.

extendedJSLoginRoutine.title: ExtendedJSLoginRoutine
extendedJSLoginRoutine.description: A login routine that relies on javascript-instructions.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An operation on the webpage that is part of the routine process. For example, load a page or execute some JavaScript.

HTTPPasswordChangeRoutine.title: HTTPPasswordChangeRoutine
HTTPPasswordChangeRoutine.description: A password change routine that can be executed by sending a HTTP request.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An operation on the webpage that is part of the routine process. For example, load a page or fill and submit a form.

htmlPasswordChangeRoutine.title: HTMLPasswordChangeRoutine
htmlPasswordChangeRoutine.description: A password change routine for page that does not need javascript.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An operation on the webpage that is part of the routine process. For example, load a page or fill and submit a form.

javascriptPasswordChangeRoutine.title: JavascriptPasswordChangeRoutine
javascriptPasswordChangeRoutine.description: A password change routine for page that needs javascript.

type.title: Routine login type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

extendedJSPasswordChangeRoutine.title: ExtendedJSPasswordChangeRoutine
extendedJSPasswordChangeRoutine.description: A password change routine that relies on javascript-instructions.

type.title: Routine password change type
type.description: The of the routine. Different routine types may contain different type of instructions and instructions may be interpreted differently.

assert.title: A set of asserts, where at least 1 should be true. Evaluated as logical OR.

frameUrl.description: If the instruction should be executed within an iframe on the page, this value should contain the URL of that iframe.

getInstruction.title: GetInstruction
getInstruction.description: A Get-instruction navigates to a certain URL. It is completed when the page is fully loaded.

url.title: URL
url.description: The url where should be navigated to.

formInstruction.title: FormInstruction
formInstruction.description: A Form-instructions fills in and submits the form. How the form is submitted depends on the type of routine.

selector.description: A CSS selector of the form that should be filled. If this instruction is part of a htmlRoutine, this form will be submitted.

value.description: This value should be replaced by the actual value by the application

selector.description: A CSS selector of the input field that should be filled.

script.title: Script
script.description: JavaScript code that should be executed to submit the form. Will only be executed if this instruction is part of an extendedJSRoutine.

javascriptInstruction.title: JavascriptInstruction
javascriptInstruction.description: A Javascript-instructions executes a string of JavaScript.

script.title: Script
script.description: JavaScript code that should be executed

skipInstruction.title: JavascriptInstruction
skipInstruction.description: A Javascript-instructions executes a string of JavaScript.

urlAssert.title: URLAssert
urlAssert.description: Assert is true when currently on the URL specified in 'prefix'

selectAssert.title: SelectAssert
selectAssert.description: Assert is true when an element with the specified CSS-selector is found.

minOccurs.description: The minimum number of times the selector should be found on the page.

maxOccurs.description: The maximum number of times the selector should be found on the page.

frameUrl.description: The assert inherits the frameUrl of its instruction, but if the assert should be executed in a different iframe on the page, this value should contain the URL of that iframe.

cookieAssert.title: CookieAssert
cookieAssert.description: Assert is true when cookie is found.

noCookieAssert.title: NoCookieAssert
noCookieAssert.description: Assert is true when cookie is not found.

findAssert.title: FindAssert
findAssert.description: Check whether a certain pattern (regex) can be found on the page.

minOccurs.description: The minimum number of times the selector should be found on the page.

maxOccurs.description: The maximum number of times the selector should be found on the page.

expression.description: The pattern that should be found on the page.

frameUrl.description: The assert inherits the frameUrl of its instruction, but if the assert should be executed in a different iframe on the page, this value should contain the URL of that iframe.

childMutationAssert.title: ChildMutationAssert
childMutationAssert.description: A childMutationObserver observes when childNodes are added or removed on the subtree of a node. See MutationObserver documentation.

items.title: Selector
items.description: The CSS selector the node that should be found in the removedNodes array of the mutation

items.title: Selector
items.description: The CSS selector the node that should be found in the addedNodes array of the mutation

frameUrl.description: The assert inherits the frameUrl of its instruction, but if the assert should be executed in a different iframe on the page, this value should contain the URL of that iframe.

attributeMutationAssert.title: AttributeMutationAssert
attributeMutationAssert.description: An attributeMutationObserver observes attribute mutations on a node, for example class changes. See MutationObserver documentation

selector.title: selector
selector.description: The CSS-selector of the element the MutationObserver should be place upon.

attributeName.title: AttributeName
attributeName.description: The name of the attribute that should be observed by the MutationObserver

removedAttributes.title: RemovedAttributes
removedAttributes.description: A string that should not be found in the current attribute value, but in the oldAttributes value of the mutation.

addedAttributes.title: AddedAttributes
addedAttributes.description: A string that should be found in the current attribute value and not in the oldAttributes value of the mutation.

frameUrl.description: The assert inherits the frameUrl of its instruction, but if the assert should be executed in a different iframe on the page, this value should contain the URL of that iframe.
